ptr.mapmanager.extend_map_after_x.en-us: A vote to extend the map time can only be initiated after {green}{0}{white} seconds.
ptr.mapmanager.extend_map_after_x.zh-cn: {green}{0}{white} 秒后才能发起延长地图时间投票.

ptr.mapmanager.max_extends_reached.en-us: The maximum number of times the time can be extended has been reached.
ptr.mapmanager.max_extends_reached.zh-cn: 已到达最大可延长时间次数。

ptr.mapmanager.you_already_voted_to_exte.en-us: You have already voted to extend the map time.
ptr.mapmanager.you_already_voted_to_exte.zh-cn: 你已经投票过延长地图时间了。

ptr.mapmanager.extend_vote_progress.en-us: {green}{0}{white} players have voted to extend the map time, {green}{1}{white} more votes needed.
ptr.mapmanager.extend_vote_progress.zh-cn: 已有 {green}{0}{white} 人投票延长地图时间，还需 {green}{1}{white} 票。

ptr.mapmanager.extend_vote_passed.en-us: Vote passed, the map time will be extended.
ptr.mapmanager.extend_vote_passed.zh-cn: 投票通过，即将延长地图持续时间。

ptr.mapmanager.nominate_not_enough_playe.en-us: At least {green}{0}{white} players are required to nominate maps.
ptr.mapmanager.nominate_not_enough_playe.zh-cn: 当前在线人数不足 {green}{0}{white} 人，无法提名地图。

ptr.mapmanager.map_already_nominated.en-us: This map has already been nominated.
ptr.mapmanager.map_already_nominated.zh-cn: 该地图已经被提名过了。

ptr.mapmanager.map_recently_played.en-us: This map was played recently and cannot be nominated.
ptr.mapmanager.map_recently_played.zh-cn: 该地图最近已经玩过了，目前无法提名。

ptr.mapmanager.map_not_found.en-us: Cannot find this map in the map pool.
ptr.mapmanager.map_not_found.zh-cn: 无法从图池中找到该地图。

ptr.mapmanager.cannot_nominate_current_m.zh-cn: 不能投票正在游玩的地图。

ptr.mapmanager.rtv_after_x.en-us: A vote to change the map can only be initiated after {green}{0}{white} seconds.
ptr.mapmanager.rtv_after_x.zh-cn: {green}{0}{white} 秒后才能发起换图投票。

ptr.mapmanager.already_voted_rtv.en-us: You have already voted to change the map!

ptr.mapmanager.rtv_vote_progress.en-us: {green}{0}{white} players have voted to change the map, {green}{1}{white} more votes needed.
ptr.mapmanager.rtv_vote_progress.zh-cn: 已有 {green}{0}{white} 人投票换图，还需 {green}{1}{white} 票。

ptr.mapmanager.rtv_vote_passed.en-us: RTV vote passed! Map voting will start after this round ends.
ptr.mapmanager.rtv_vote_passed.zh-cn: 投票换图通过！将在回合结束后开始投票。
